resources.string: I have a collection of food props and noticed that I have a disproportionate number of bowls compared to plates. Bowls make me happy. This was shot on a white tablecloth in my studio with natural light from a south facing window and some additional light from my Westcott 2 x 2 flex mat LED light as 30% bightness.
Mexicab . 18 Thank House Lane Hip spot for Mexican tapas with a patio Open until 12:00 AM
